description.value:
You gain the following features based on your Vocation.

  • Glyphic Resonance (Gilder): The first time each round that an energized creature takes a main action, you gain 2 wonder instead of 1.

  • Alchemical Tolerance (Catalyst): The first time each round that a creature uses an elixir, you gain 2 wonder instead of 1.

  • Shock Absorbers (Golemancer): The first time each round that your servitor takes damage, you gain 2 wonder instead of 1.

  • Experimental Leverage (Magitecht): The first time each round that a hero activates one of your experimental devices, you gain 2 wonder instead of 1.
